XIII.i.8.A.1.f
.
Annual Clothing Allowance Eligibility for Hospitalized Veterans
A hospitalized Veteran, competent or incompetent, remains eligible for an ACAP.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 8, Section A - Clothing Allowance
